author: Bruce Lee
message: Notice that the stiffest tree is most easily cracked, while the bamboo or willow survives by bending with the wind.
title: Thought of the day

author: Alfred Sheinwold
message: Learn all you can from the mistakes of others. You won't have time to make them all yourself.
title: Thought of the day

author: Sri Chinmoy
message: Judge nothing, you will be happy. Forgive everything, you will be happier. Love everything, you will be happiest.
title: Thought of the day

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message: People are so constituted that everybody would rather undertake what they see others do, whether they have an aptitude for it or not.
title: Thought of the day
